page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE-LILLESHALL AREA
page.content: In the combined parishes of{Lilleshall {,Chetwynd Aston }and{Church Aston,} very few mothers now work full time ,although some work part time.Approx.50% of the people have most of their meals in front of the T.V.,although the majority of these have regular Sunday dinner.The number of church goers in our area has fallen to very low , and the number of children attending Sunday School has dropped considerably as well. Most of the people in the three communities have not been abroad, although everybody has been on holiday . A lot of people among the ones that go abroad stay in a tent when they go on holiday away from our country.Most people in the area go swimming for pleasure .Although almost nobody does orienteering in our area walking is quite popular.
